Job Description: Job Description:We are seeking a Bilingual Project Manager to work with us in the development and maintenance of our platformsRequirements:• Proficiency in Japanese Language (JLPT N2 certified)• 3  5 years of overall experience• Experience in web application project management• Possess KPI management knowledge/experience• Excellent communication skills to enable stakeholder management• High problem solving skill that able to understand different business and provide data driven solutions• Ability to meet tough deadlines, handle stress, and have good judgment• Ability to manage cross functional development teamDesired Qualifications:• Experience in using version control (GIT) and other tools such as BitBucket, Jenkins, Jira• Agile certification• Scrum master• PMP
